channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Instacart’s AI-driven pricing tool attracted attention — now the FTC has questions
item.description: In an economy where everyone's feeling squeezed, AI-driven price testing of kitchen essentials was bound to attract attention.

item.title: The Gozney Dome (Gen 2) might be the ultimate backyard pizza oven – but its pro features come with a steep price tag
item.description: The Gozney Dome (Gen 2) may be a pizza oven first and foremost, but it's ability to be used as a fully-fledged outdoor kitchen makes it invaluable for budding chefs.
